body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Nathan Hill and the customer's name is Jacqueline Davis.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Nathan Hill, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Nathan, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you too! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jacqueline! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to buy a motorcycle, but I'm a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that it can be overwhelming. Can I ask, what is your current budget?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to spend around two thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, two zero zero zero dollars. And could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my zip code is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Jacqueline! I'll find some options that suit your budget and location.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds good, Nathan. I appreciate your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, and I look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle!
